title: Crescendo *
description: Vert. Stripe ( fringed)  on casement.  2\" horiz. Rpt. 2/3 of vert. Stripes have cut fringe. Fringed, vert. stripe. Open, bal. weave with grps of heavy warp every 2in. cut into 1 in. fringe every 3.5 in. 1st 37 in. of width heavy warp incl. metlc gold.  Last 20.5 in. heavy warps incl. metlc silver. white /gold & silver metallic
